Player History
Drafted in 2nd round, 33rd overall pick, by Wisconsin in 1976...
Had first career hit (double) on 4/6/1979, off Robert Eastman (Min)...
Hit first career homerun on 5/6/1979, off Roberto Sabatini (MAN)...
Drove in 6 runs against Pittsburgh on 7/23/1979...
Drove in 8 runs against Northeastern on 7/6/1982...
Drove in 6 runs against Northeastern on 9/10/1983...
Traded from Wisconsin to Syracuse on 3/2/1984 (Going to SYR: CF L. Batts, P J. Poon. Going to WIS: P R. Najera, C C. Mayes)...
Drove in 6 runs against Halifax on 6/25/1987...
Signed as a free agent by Coney Island on 2/15/1988 to a 2-year deal worth $7,500,000 per year...
Was selected to the 1988 Allstar game...
Had 5 hits with 0 RBI against Diablo on 4/7/1990...
Injured on 9/16/1990 with a Torn Abdominal Muscle, out for full season...
Signed as a free agent by Bay City on 3/1/1993 to a minor league contract.
